Text.Page:
Undead horrors have seized the mines in Fyrmount.

Those mines provide important war materiel for the federation. Head to Cauldron Outpost and see whether you can lend a hand.

Always glad to see reinforcements from Castanica.

Talk to Keinie. She has a better head for organizing than I do. I'm more of a "break things" kind of girl.

If you can kill undead—yeah, I know, they're already dead, whatever—then I can put you to work.

Name? ? How do you spell that?

Got it. Now make yourself useful!
